description:
### Context
A dear friend of mine has a sport betting company in Brazil called Game Winner (https://gamewinner.com.br/), and I asked him to provide their data so I could publish and analyze.

### Content
All data (dates, bets, criterias results) is from 2022.

### Acknowledgements
I would like to thank Rodrigo Mota (https://www.linkedin.com/in/rodrigo-mota-358b939a/) for providing the data and some explanations about it.

### Inspiration
Is the company perfoming really well all the time? Is it possible to predict outcomes?
title: 2022 Game Winner Sports Betting Data
